function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete data on reported cases","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of disease spread","Mitigation":"Ensure comprehensive data collection and reporting","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools","People":"Public health authorities, researchers","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Reference to external sources without context","Impact":"Uncertain reliability of information","Mitigation":"Verify and contextualize external references","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, research databases","People":"Readers, researchers","Owner":"Authors, publishers"}]}
